long_description: The 82 ft. Gibbon Red Classic Slackline X13 kit sets up quickly and easily so beginners and experts alike can enjoy this simple, fun and challenging sport! Consisting of only two parts, the Gibbon Red Classic Slackline X13 kit can be quickly rigged between 2 trees and set up at a length up to 82 ft. X13 slackline is 1.5 ft. longer on the ratchet side than the standard Gibbon Classic slackline, letting you set up around bigger trees; also includes a pad for the ratchet. 2 in. wide webbing can be mounted just a couple feet off the ground. Integrated ratchet lets you set the tension just right; keep it loose for lots of bounce or tighten it up some for more stability. Gibbon Red Classic Slackline X13 kit includes slackline, ratchet, pad for the ratchet and an instruction manual.
short_description: The 82 ft. Gibbon Red Classic Slackline X13 kit sets up quickly and easily so beginners and experts alike can enjoy this simple, fun and challenging sport!
